parameters.userMetadata: usermetadata is a placeholder to store user-defined string data for the HybridConnection endpoint.e.g. it can be used to store  descriptive data, such as list of teams and their contact information also user-defined configuration settings can be stored.

properties.userMetadata: usermetadata is a placeholder to store user-defined string data for the HybridConnection endpoint.e.g. it can be used to store  descriptive data, such as list of teams and their contact information also user-defined configuration settings can be stored.
